title: The Longest Ride. Official Movie Trailer #2 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: April 10th, 2015

Description:

Based on the bestselling novel by master storyteller Nicholas Sparks, THE LONGEST RIDE centers on the star-crossed love affair between Luke, a former champion bull rider looking to make a comeback, and Sophia, a college student who is about to embark upon her dream job in New York CityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s art world. As conflicting paths and ideals test their relationship, Sophia and Luke make an unexpected and fateful connection with Ira, whose memories of his own decades-long romance with his beloved wife deeply inspire the young couple. Spanning generations and two intertwining love stories, THE LONGEST RIDE explores the challenges and infinite rewards of enduring love.

Director: George Tillman, Jr.

Writers: Craig Bolotin, Nicholas Sparks

Actors: Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood, Jack Huston, Oona Chaplin, Alan Alda

Genre: Romance, Drama
